description: Manages a Azure Machine Learning Workspace

Type.description: The Type of Identity which should be used for this Disk Encryption Set. At this time the only possible value is `SystemAssigned`.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ApplicationInsightsId.description: The ID of the Application Insights associated with this Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ContainerRegistryId.description: The ID of the container registry associated with this Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Description.description: The description of this Machine Learning Workspace.

FriendlyName.description: Friendly name for this Machine Learning Workspace.

HighBusinessImpact.description: Flag to signal High Business Impact (HBI) data in the workspace and reduce diagnostic data collected by the service.

KeyVaultId.description: The ID of key vault associated with this Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the Machine Learning Workspace should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: Specifies the name of the Resource Group in which the Machine Learning Workspace should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

SkuName.description: SKU/edition of the Machine Learning Workspace, possible values are `Basic`. Defaults to `Basic`.

StorageAccountId.description: The ID of the Storage Account associated with this Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
